Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Finance, pursuant to sections 389a, 403a and 463b of the Cooperative Credit Associations Actc, hereby makes the annexed Investment Limits (Cooperative Credit Associations) Regulations.

Section.Text: The following definitions apply in these Regulations.

Definition.Text: Act means the Cooperative Credit Associations Act.
designated entity means an entity other than

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a joint venture;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: an insurance company;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: a securities dealer; or

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: a subsidiary of an insurance company or securities dealer.

Definition.Text: insurance company means an insurance company incorporated by or under the laws of Canada or a province.
joint venture means a real property entity

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: that was formed by an association, or by a designated entity controlled by an association, and one or more other persons for the purpose of a specific business undertaking;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in which the association or designated entity has a substantial investment; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of which the persons who formed it have agreed on joint control, regardless of the distribution of their equity.

Definition.Text: real property entity means an entity that is primarily engaged in holding, managing or otherwise dealing with

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: real property;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: shares of a body corporate that is primarily engaged in holding, managing or otherwise dealing with real property, including shares of a body corporate that is another real property entity; or

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: ownership interests in an unincorporated entity that is primarily engaged in holding, managing or otherwise dealing with real property, including ownership interests in an unincorporated entity that is another real property entity.

Definition.Text: related real property entity, in respect of an association, means

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a real property entity, other than a designated entity controlled by the association, in which the association or a designated entity controlled by the association beneficially owns sufficient shares or ownership interests to cause the association or designated entity to have a substantial investment in the real property entity; or

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a real property entity that is controlled by a real property entity described in paragraph (a).

Definition.Text: securities dealer means an entity described in paragraph (g) of the definition financial institution in section 2 of the Act.
third party, in respect of an association, means a person other than

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: the association;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a designated entity controlled by the association; or

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: a related real property entity of the association.

Section.MarginalNote: Book value of interest in real property
Section.Text: For the purposes of sections 8 to 11, the book value of an asset that is an interest of an association in real property, at a particular time, is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: if the asset is real property, the gross book value of the real property, less any accumulated depreciation on the real property, that would be reported on a balance sheet of the association prepared as at that time in accordance with the accounting principles and specifications of the Superintendent referred to in subsection 292(4) of the Act; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: if the asset is a security or loan, the book value of the security or loan that would be reported on a balance sheet of the association prepared as at that time in accordance with the accounting principles and specifications of the Superintendent referred to in subsection 292(4) of the Act.

Section.Text: Sections 401 and 402 of the Act do not apply to an association if the sum of the equity of the association and the minority interests in entities controlled by the association, as they appear in the consolidated financial statements of the association, is five billion dollars or more.
For the purposes of sections 401 and 402 of the Act, a prescribed subsidiary of an association is a subsidiary of the association other than

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: an insurance company;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a securities dealer; or

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: a subsidiary of an insurance company or securities dealer.

Subsection.Text: The following definitions apply in this section.

Definition.Text: real property percentage of an association means the amount determined by the formula

FormulaDefinition.Text: is the total value of all interests of the association in real property, other than interests that, because of section 397 of the Act, are not to be included in computing the value of loans, investments and interests of the association, and of its subsidiaries prescribed by section 4, under sections 398 to 402 of the Act; and
is the regulatory capital of the association.

Definition.Text: equity percentage of an association means the amount determined by the formula

FormulaDefinition.Text: is the total value of all participating shares that are beneficially owned by the association and its subsidiaries prescribed by section 4, other than

FormulaParagraph.Label: (a)
FormulaParagraph.Text: participating shares of permitted entities in which the association has a substantial investment, and

FormulaParagraph.Label: (b)
FormulaParagraph.Text: shares that, because of section 397 of the Act, are not to be included in computing the value of loans, investments and interests of the association, and of its subsidiaries prescribed by section 4, under sections 398 to 402 of the Act;

FormulaDefinition.Text: is the total value of all ownership interests in unincorporated entities that are beneficially owned by the association and its subsidiaries prescribed by section 4, other than

FormulaParagraph.Label: (a)
FormulaParagraph.Text: ownership interests in permitted entities in which the association has a substantial investment, and

FormulaParagraph.Label: (b)
FormulaParagraph.Text: ownership interests that, because of section 397 of the Act, are not to be included in computing the value of loans, investments and interests of the association, and of its subsidiaries prescribed by section 4, under sections 398 to 402 of the Act; and

FormulaDefinition.Text: is the regulatory capital of the association.

Subsection.Text: For the purpose of section 401 of the Act, the prescribed percentage of the regulatory capital of an association is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: 35%, if the association is primarily engaged in the business of managing liquidity or providing treasury, clearing, settlement or payment services;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: 70%, if the association is not an association referred to in paragraph (a) and its equity percentage does not exceed 30%; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: 100% minus its equity percentage, if the association is not an association referred to in paragraph (a) and its equity percentage exceeds 30%.

Subsection.Text: For the purpose of section 402 of the Act, the prescribed percentage of the regulatory capital of an association is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: 35%, if the association is primarily engaged in the business of managing liquidity or providing treasury, clearing, settlement or payment services;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: 70%, if the association is not an association referred to in paragraph (a) and its real property percentage does not exceed 30%; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: 100% minus its real property percentage, if the association is not an association referred to in paragraph (a) and its real property percentage exceeds 30%.

Section.Text: For the purpose of section 402 of the Act, the value of the participating shares and ownership interests referred to in that section that are beneficially owned by an association and its subsidiaries prescribed by section 4 is equal to their book value as reported on the consolidated balance sheet of the association.

Heading.TitleText: Interests of an Association in Real Property

Section.MarginalNote: Definition of interest in real property

Subsection.Text: For the purposes of Part X of the Act, other than subsection 397(3) of the Act, sections 8 to 12 define the interests of an association in real property and set out how those interests are to be valued.

For the purpose of subsection 397(3) of the Act, the interests of an association in real property means real property referred to in paragraph 11(1)(a) and shares and ownership interests referred to in paragraph 11(1)(b) that become beneficially owned by the association, or by a designated entity controlled by the association, as a result of the realization of a security interest on a loan or debt obligation referred to in subsection 11(1).

Heading.TitleText: Direct Interests — Real Property and Debt Obligations

Subsection.Text: The following are interests of an association in real property:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: real property beneficially owned by the association or by a designated entity controlled by the association; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a debt obligation, for which the association or a designated entity controlled by the association is liable, that was issued for the purpose of acquiring or improving real property referred to in paragraph (a).

Subsection.Text: The value of the interests of an association in real property is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of real property referred to in paragraph (1)(a), the book value of the real property; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a debt obligation referred to in paragraph (1)(b), any amount by which the book value of the debt obligation exceeds the book value of the real property referred to in that paragraph.

Heading.TitleText: Indirect Interests — Real Property, Shares and Ownership Interests

Subsection.Text: The following are interests of an association in real property:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: at a particular time, real property

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: that is beneficially owned by

Clause.Label: (A)
Clause.Text: a related real property entity of the association that is a joint venture, or

Clause.Label: (B)
Clause.Text: an entity in which an entity described in clause (A) has a substantial investment, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: that would be reported on a balance sheet of the association prepared as at that time in accordance with the accounting principles and specifications of the Superintendent referred to in subsection 292(4) of the Act; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: shares and ownership interests beneficially owned by the association, or by a designated entity controlled by the association, in any related real property entity of the association other than a related real property entity referred to in paragraph (a).

Subsection.Text: The value of the interests of an association in real property is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of real property referred to in paragraph (1)(a), the book value of the real property; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of shares and ownership interests referred to in paragraph (1)(b), the book value of the shares and ownership interests.

Heading.TitleText: Indirect Interests — Loans and Debt Obligations

Subsection.Text: The following are interests of an association in real property:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a debt obligation issued by a related real property entity of the association and beneficially owned by the association or by a designated entity controlled by the association;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a loan made by the association, or by a designated entity controlled by the association, to a related real property entity of the association;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: a loan made by the association, or by a designated entity controlled by the association, to

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: a real property entity in which a securities dealer or insurance company controlled by the association has a substantial investment, or

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: a real property entity that is controlled by a real property entity described in subparagraph (i);

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: a debt obligation issued by a real property entity described in subparagraph (c)(i) or (ii) and beneficially owned by the association or by a designated entity controlled by the association;

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: a debt obligation that is

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: issued by a related real property entity of the association,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: beneficially owned by a third party, and

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: guaranteed by the association or by a designated entity controlled by the association; and

Paragraph.Label: (f)
Paragraph.Text: a loan made by a third party to a related real property entity of the association and guaranteed by the association or by a designated entity controlled by the association.

Subsection.Text: The value of the interests of an association in real property is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a debt obligation referred to in paragraph (1)(a) or (d), the book value of the debt obligation;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a loan referred to in paragraph (1)(b) or (c), the book value of the loan; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a guaranteed debt obligation referred to in paragraph (1)(e) or a guaranteed loan referred to in paragraph (1)(f),

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: if the debt obligation is issued by, or the loan is made to, an entity that is a related real property entity of the association and the entity beneficially owns real property that is an interest of the association in real property under paragraph 9(1)(a), any amount by which the face value of the guarantee exceeds the value of the real property determined in accordance with paragraph 9(2)(a), and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: in any other case, the face value of the guarantee.

Heading.TitleText: Indirect Interests — Secured Loans and Debt Obligations

Subsection.Text: If an association or a designated entity controlled by an association makes a loan to, or beneficially owns or guarantees the debt obligation of, a third party, the loan or debt obligation is an interest of the association in real property if it is secured by

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: real property beneficially owned by a third party in conjunction with

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the association,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the designated entity,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: a related real property entity of the association,

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: a securities dealer or insurance company controlled by the association,

Subparagraph.Label: (v)
Subparagraph.Text: an entity controlled by a securities dealer or insurance company referred to in subparagraph (iv), or

Subparagraph.Label: (vi)
Subparagraph.Text: a real property entity described in subparagraph 10(1)(c)(i) or (ii); or

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: shares or ownership interests beneficially owned by a third party in

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: an entity that beneficially owns real property in conjunction with the association, a related real property entity of the association or a designated entity controlled by the association, or

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: a related real property entity of the association.

Subsection.Text: The value of the interests of an association in real property is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a loan or debt obligation that is secured by real property referred to in paragraph (1)(a), the lesser of

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the net realizable value of the third party’s interest in the real property at the time that the security interest was given, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the amount determined by the formula

FormulaParagraph.Label: (A)
FormulaParagraph.Text: if the loan was made by the association or a designated entity controlled by the association or the debt obligation is beneficially owned by the association or a designated entity controlled by the association, the book value of the loan or debt obligation, or

FormulaParagraph.Label: (B)
FormulaParagraph.Text: if the debt obligation is guaranteed by the association or a designated entity controlled by the association, the face value of the guarantee, and

FormulaDefinition.Text: is the total net realizable value of any other security interests that were given for the loan or debt obligation;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a loan or debt obligation that is secured by shares or ownership interests beneficially owned by a third party in an entity referred to in subparagraph (1)(b)(i), the lesser of

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the net realizable value of the third party’s interest in those shares or ownership interests at the time that the security interest was given, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the amount determined by the formula

FormulaParagraph.Label: (A)
FormulaParagraph.Text: if the loan was made by the association or a designated entity controlled by the association or the debt obligation is beneficially owned by the association or a designated entity controlled by the association, the book value of the loan or debt obligation, or

FormulaParagraph.Label: (B)
FormulaParagraph.Text: if the debt obligation is guaranteed by the association or a designated entity controlled by the association, the face value of the guarantee,

FormulaDefinition.Text: is the total net realizable value of all security interests that were given for the loan or debt obligation,
is the net realizable value of the entity’s interest in the real property referred to in subparagraph (1)(b)(i),
is the value of the shares or ownership interests that are given as the security interest, and
is the total value of the outstanding shares or ownership interests in the entity; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a loan or debt obligation that is secured by shares or ownership interests beneficially owned by a third party in a related real property entity referred to in subparagraph (1)(b)(ii), the lesser of

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the net realizable value of the third party’s interest in those shares or ownership interests at the time that the security interest was given, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the amount determined by the formula

FormulaParagraph.Label: (A)
FormulaParagraph.Text: if the loan was made by the association or a designated entity controlled by the association or the debt obligation is beneficially owned by the association or a designated entity controlled by the association, the book value of the loan or debt obligation, or

FormulaParagraph.Label: (B)
FormulaParagraph.Text: if the debt obligation is guaranteed by the association or a designated entity controlled by the association, the face value of the guarantee, and

FormulaDefinition.Text: is the total net realizable value of any other security interests that were given for the loan or debt obligation.

Subsection.Text: The following are interests of an association in real property:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a guarantee given by the association, or by a designated entity controlled by the association, to an entity other than the association or designated entity for the purpose of completing the development of real property that is beneficially owned by

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the association,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: a designated entity controlled by the association, or

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: a related real property entity of the association; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: an agreement made by the association, or by a designated entity controlled by the association, to support a third party’s cost of operating or financing real property that is beneficially owned by

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the association,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: a designated entity controlled by the association, or

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: a related real property entity of the association.

Subsection.Text: The value of the interests of an association in real property is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a guarantee referred to in paragraph (1)(a), the estimated cost of completing the development of the real property; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of an agreement referred to in paragraph (1)(b), the amount of any funds advanced by the association, or by a designated entity controlled by the association, under the agreement.

Section.Text: These Regulations come into force on the day on which sections 389 and 403 of the Cooperative Credit Associations Act, as enacted by section 314 of the Financial Consumer Agency of Canada Act, chapter 9 of the Statutes of Canada, 2001, come into force.

Footnote.Text: [Note: Regulations in force October 24, 2001, see SI/2001-102.]
